content: Kaut kā galīgi greizi, ka spoiler tegā noslēpti linki tiek visi preview taisīts... https://osmlatvija.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/358602-general/topic/LVC.20ce.C4.BCi/near/403568856 Priekš tam taču arī ir speciāli spoiler tegs, lai nerādītu neko iekšā līdz user's pats nospiež - kāda no tā tad jēga, ja preview visu nospoilo. Un prakstiki, uztaisa to message vēl garāku nekā, ja būtu vienkārši spoiler teksts. Github issue neredzu.

You should check out Total Recall - it's got a great ending twist

Don't click this if you don't want the ending spoiler

Read more here: https://moviesandscience.com/blog/movies/totalrecall

TOTAL RECALL (1990), and Why It Is All a Dream. — MOVIESANDSCIENCE.COM
Total Recall Ending Explained Was it real? was it a dream? Total Recall Movie
